quest_name: Wizard Epic 1.0 - Staff of the Four

steps.description: Speak to Arantir Karondor in Qeynos to begin the epic quest.
Kill Venril Sathir in Karnor’s Castle and loot the Arantir’s Scroll.
Give Arantir’s Scroll to Arantir Karondor in Qeynos to receive the Rune of Astral.
Kill Cazic Thule in Plane of Fear and loot the Rune of Elemental.
Kill Phinigel Autropos in Kedge Keep and loot the Rune of Energy.
Kill Trakanon in Old Sebilis and loot the Rune of Power.
Combine Rune of Astral, Rune of Elemental, Rune of Energy, and Rune of Power in the Wizard’s Spellbook to create the Completed Spellbook.
Give Completed Spellbook to Arantir Karondor in Qeynos to receive the Staff of the Four.
